Package net.chaossquad.mclib.packetentity

Class PacketEntity<T extends net.minecraft.world.entity.Entity>

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.packetentity.PacketEntity<T>
Type Parameters:
T - entity type if relevant
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraft.world.level.entity.EntityInLevelCallback
public class PacketEntity<T extends net.minecraft.world.entity.Entity> extends Object implements net.minecraft.world.level.entity.EntityInLevelCallback
Represents a packet entity. Contains the NMS entity, the players that can see it and custom data for that entity.

    • getPlayers

      public List<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getPlayers()
      Returns a list of all players that can see the entity. This does not include players in the list that don't meet the conditions for seeing the entity
      Returns:
      list of players

    • hasPlayer

      public boolean hasPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Returns true if the specified player can see the entity. Else, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      player - player that should be checked for
      Returns:
      true if player can see entity, false if not
